series.name: Runaways
series.description: A group of teenagers who discover that their parents are part of an evil crime organization called 'The Pride'

heroes.name: Alex Wilder
heroes.description: The de facto leader of the original Runaways. Son of crime bosses, he's a tactical genius but harbors dark secrets.

heroes.name: Nico Minoru
heroes.description: A Japanese-American witch who wields the Staff of One, a powerful magical artifact that prevents her from casting the same spell twice.

heroes.name: Chase Stein
heroes.nickname: Talkback / Gun Arm / Neo / Darkhawk / Chasehawk
heroes.description: The team's resident tough guy and mechanic. Son of time-traveling scientists, he wears flame-projecting gauntlets called Fistigons.

heroes.name: Gertrude Yorkes
heroes.description: A sarcastic, intelligent girl with a telepathic bond to a genetically-engineered deinonychus from the future named Old Lace.

heroes.name: Molly Hayes
heroes.description: The youngest member of the team with incredible super strength. Her powers cause her to become tired and need naps after use.

heroes.name: Victor Mancha
heroes.description: A cyborg created by Ultron to infiltrate and destroy the Avengers. He later joins the Runaways and struggles with his dark origins.

heroes.name: Karolina Dean
heroes.nickname: Lucy in the Sky / Princess Justice
heroes.description: An alien Majesdanian with the ability to manipulate solar energy and light. She can fly and project powerful energy blasts.

heroes.name: Compasi√≥n
heroes.description: A mysterious character with empathic abilities who can sense and influence emotions. Details about their background remain largely unknown.

team.name: The Runaways
team.description: Teenage superhero team formed after discovering their parents' villainous activities
team.base: The Hostel (various locations in Los Angeles)
